projects.title: Software Engineer 2
projects.description: The job involved working for a global advertising marketplace that allowed media owners to boost their revenue by facilitating marketers to reach consumers on any screen, utilizing any ad format.

projects.title: Full Stack Developer
projects.description: The position involves developing web-based parking solutions, such as a notification system that sends email alerts to users when a matching license plate is detected during entry or exit, as well as a dynamic registration page for monthly parking that can be customized based on clients' payment methods, card delivery options, and required fields.
